rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 6 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:26 PM, 24 June 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Quezon and Bulacan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Nueva Ecija(Gabaldon, General Tinio) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
